verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. LORD <WH3068>, who shall abide <WH1481> in thy tabernacle <WH168>? who shall dwell <WH7931> in thy holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>?
He that walketh <WH1980> uprightly <WH8549>, and worketh <WH6466> righteousness <WH6664>, and speaketh <WH1696> the truth <WH571> in his heart <WH3824>.
He that backbiteth <WH7270> not with his tongue <WH3956>, nor doeth <WH6213> evil <WH7451> to his neighbour <WH7453>, nor taketh up <WH5375> a reproach <WH2781> against his neighbour <WH7138>.

In whose eyes <WH5869> a vile person <WH3988> is contemned <WH959>; but he honoureth <WH3513> them that fear <WH3373> the LORD <WH3068>. He that sweareth <WH7650> to his own hurt <WH7489>, and changeth <WH4171> not.

He that putteth not out <WH5414> his money <WH3701> to usury <WH5392>, nor taketh <WH3947> reward <WH7810> against the innocent <WH5355>. He that doeth <WH6213> these things shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131>.
